summary: Adds a fully animated short folding rapier to the game inspired by you know who! Craft at any forge under Steel. Temper, Enchant, Enjoy :)
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: 0.91

Fixed 'Flat' Normal map in game.
=========================================================================================

What is this mod? 

Adds a fully animated short folding rapier to the game inspired by you know who! Craft at any forge under Steel. Temper, Enchant, Enjoy :) 
=========================================================================================


[youtube]k52wAN0c4b0[/youtube]  		[youtube]MSLdTQdt7Xo[/youtube]  


 [youtube]w69s8BsdKds[/youtube]   		[youtube]2LjbnLfu5LQ[/youtube]  

Once again dptheslothking has been kind enough to do a showcase for the mod. Please check out and support his channel here.

http://www.youtube.com/user/Slothability?feature=watch


Gruntlock/Ruiuji also put together a showcase, thanks a million dude. You can check out his channel here.

https://www.youtube.com/user/Gruntlock?feature=watch

More big thanks to misalen for the mod feature. Check out his channel here

http://www.youtube.com/user/SkyttsTV?feature=watch


and thanks to sidras01 for his feature, his channel here

http://www.youtube.com/user/seriezs?feature=watch


=======================================================================

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help Corvo 4

Player.additem XX 000D62 1

in the console. 

=======================================================================
INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM. 

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don't forget to activate the .esp :) 

=======================================================================
author: KettleWitch
